flags.description: New entity types this can apply to
flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.validation: Comma-separated types; each must be one of: PredictionSubject, Comment, FileAttachment, PredictionKnowledgeBaseQuestion.

permissions: Only admin users can update tag categories.
side_effects: Updates the specified tag category fields.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --name, --slug, --description, or --can-apply-to must be provided. name and slug must be unique (case-insensitive). can-apply-to must include only allowed types: PredictionSubject, Comment, FileAttachment, PredictionKnowledgeBaseQuestion.
